body_content.explanation: someone who makes models as a job or hobby :
examples: He was an outstanding modeller of bronze heads of famous people.
Experienced modellers will have no trouble building this aircraft from the plans.

body_content.explanation: someone who makes calculations or predictions (= statements about what might happen in the future) based on models (= simple descriptions of systems or processes):
examples: The numerical modellers can determine the chemical and physical interactions between drug and target.
Have climate modellers factored in the impact of an increase in ocean area on climate?
